name: Dr. Jose Immanuel R
title: Assistant Professor, Outstanding Young Faculty Chair & Head, AMDCG
bio: Specializing in advanced materials and computational design, Prof. Jose Immanuel leads the group with a vision for impactful research and innovation.

contributions.description: Leading the development of novel quantum algorithms for simulating complex material properties and predicting their behavior at atomic scales.
Overseeing the application of machine learning techniques to accelerate the identification and design of new therapeutic compounds.

name: Dr. Santosh Kumar Tamang
title: Assistant Professor
bio: Research Interests: Optimization and Soft Computing Techniques for Design and Manufacturing, GPU Computing For FEA, Composite Materials, Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence, and DFT/Molecular Dynamics/FEA-based simulations.

contributions.description: Driving innovations in perovskite material synthesis and device architecture to achieve higher efficiencies and stability.
Investigating smart grid solutions for seamless integration of renewable energy sources into national power grids.

name: Dr. Sindhu
title: Postdoctoral Researcher
bio: Dr. Reddy's work is centered on developing novel algorithms for machine learning applications in scientific discovery.

name: RAHUL SINGH PATEL
title: Ph.D. Scholar
bio: Research area: Optimization of thermomechanical treatment of AA- 7068 alloy, Deformation behaviour of Materials,Cryorolling, Friction Stir processing ( FSP) , Residual stress development during processing of Materials and its Impact on Stress corrosion cracking behaviour of Al -7068.

name: Arjun Gupta
title: Ph.D. Scholar
bio: Arjun is developing computational models to simulate complex fluid dynamics for aerospace applications.

name: Dr. Sanjay Mittal
title: Former Postdoctoral Researcher
bio: Dr. Mittal contributed significantly to our quantum computing projects before moving to a faculty position.

name: Dr. Pooja Desai
